items.title: Federal Forces Set to Arrive in Memphis Next Week, Governor Says
items.summary: The deployment will eventually include more than a dozen federal agencies, Gov. Bill Lee of Tennessee said, as well as the National Guard.

items.title: Trump Predicts More Indictments and Claims It’s Not Revenge
items.summary: The president has cast the indictment as “justice” rather than revenge, but his own words and actions cast doubt on that assertion.

items.title: Gunman Who Attacked Midtown Office Building Had C.T.E.
items.summary: Shane Tamura, a former high school football player, shot himself and left behind a note that said his motive was anger at the N.F.L.

items.title: Brief Comey Indictment Prompts Questions and Criticism
items.summary: The two-page indictment of James B. Comey, the former F.B.I. director, offered little indication of the evidence that would be presented at a trial. Some legal experts called it flimsy and dangerous.

items.title: Close National Parks if Government Shuts Down, Former Superintendents Plead
items.summary: More than 35 former park superintendents wrote a letter to the Trump administration, saying the lands could be damaged under limited staffing.

items.title: James Comey and Donald Trump’s Relationship: A Timeline
items.summary: James B. Comey, the former F.B.I. director now under indictment, has long been a target of President Trump’s ire.

items.title: Assata Shakur, an icon of Black liberation who was exiled to Cuba, dies aged 78
items.summary: <p>Shakur spent decades exiled after she was convicted of killing a state trooper in 1977 and escaped from prison</p><p>On 25 September, Assata Shakur, a former member of the Black Liberation Army, died aged 78 in Havana, Cuba, according to <a href="https://cubaminrex.cu/es/nota-de-prensa-del-ministerio-relaciones-exteriores">Cuba’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs</a>. Cuban officials cited the reason for her death as old age and health conditions. Shakur, a longstranding symbol of resistance and Black liberation, spent several decades exiled in Cuba after she was convicted of killing a New Jersey state trooper in 1977 and escaped from prison.</p><p>“At approximately 1:15pm on September 25th, my mother, Assata Shakur, took her last earthly breath,” her daughter Kakuya Shakur wrote on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/kakuya/posts/pfbid02fi1n9xdApUzVmycCQF4HizBEhL4twDXZdxY5v7ii7v1JJUr6sdFBKvoJ1Ci71yEql">Facebook</a>. “Words cannot describe the depth of loss that I’m feeling at this time.”</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/26/assata-shakur-dies-aged-78">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Ice officer ‘relieved of duties’ after video shows him manhandling woman at New York immigration court
items.summary: <p>Monica Moreta-Galarza was pleading with officer to release her detained husband when he pushed her to the ground</p><p>A federal officer for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (<a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/ice-us-immigration-and-customs-enforcement">Ice</a>) has been “relieved of his duties” after a video showing him pushing a woman to the floor at an immigration <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/gallery/2025/sep/19/arrests-immigration-court-new-york-in-pictures">court</a> in New York City spread quickly <a href="https://x.com/propublica/status/1971387520400425057?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1971387520400425057%7Ctwgr%5E6f4e5cd301f4b662af6075460e2c891e4967a603%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&amp;ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.theguardian.com%2Fus-news%2Flive%2F2025%2Fsep%2F26%2Fjames-comey-fbi-indictment-donald-trump-executive-orders-tariffs-us-politics-live%3Fpage%3Dwith3Ablock-68d6c3ad8f081f77e6af3de5">on social media</a>.</p><p>Tricia McLaughlin, assistant secretary for public affairs at the Department of Homeland Security, said that the officer’s actions were “unacceptable and beneath the men and women of Ice”.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/26/ice-officer-video-relieved-of-duties">Continue reading...</a>
